Amaterasu.name: Amaterasu
Amaterasu.description: Black flames that burn anything they touch. Solomon's mastery allows him to shape them into weapons and constructs.

Kamui.name: Kamui
Kamui.description: Complete intangibility and dimensional manipulation. Solomon can phase through attacks and create dimensional rifts.

Susanoo_Okami.name: Susanoo: Ōkami no Yōsei
Susanoo_Okami.description: Wolf Deity Susanoo with phase-shifted armor and Amaterasu weaponry. Integrates with Four-Tails chakra.

Eclipse_Fang_Severance.name: Eclipse Fang Severance
Eclipse_Fang_Severance.description: Dimensional and conceptual severance that bypasses all defenses. Can erase concepts and sever soul connections.

Yoton_Meteor.name: Yōton: Ryūsei no Jutsu
Yoton_Meteor.description: Meteor shower of superheated lava projectiles. Creates area denial and massive destruction.

Yoton_Volcano.name: Yōton: Maguma Hōkai
Yoton_Volcano.description: Volcanic collapse that creates molten lakes and area denial. Transforms the battlefield.

Yoton_Wolf_Pack.name: Yōton: Enkō no Ōkami
Yoton_Wolf_Pack.description: Blazing wolf pack of molten constructs. Explosive and autonomous in combat.

Kokko_Chains.name: Kōkō no Kusari
Kokko_Chains.description: Absolute suppression mode with conceptual binding and ability nullification. Radiant sealing energy.

Wolf_Summoning.name: Summoning: Wolves of Kiba no Tōdai
Wolf_Summoning.description: Summons the legendary wolves: Kaze no Kiba (Scouts), Tsuchi no Yaiba (War Wolves), and Akuma (Alpha).

Final_Susanoo.name: Ōkami no Yōsei Susanoo: Final Incarnation
Final_Susanoo.description: Living armor Susanoo with auto-phase defense, Amaterasu flame cloak, and volcanic core reactor.

Pack_Release.name: Yōton: Enkō no Ōkami: Pack Release
Pack_Release.description: Autonomous lava wolves with Akuma Alpha as the howling sovereign. Ultimate pack coordination.

Adamantine_Chains.name: Adamantine Chakra-Forged Chains
Adamantine_Chains.description: Chakra-absorbing and replenishing chains that can phase via Kamui. Solomon's signature weapon.

Katon_Goka.name: Katon: Gōka Messhitsu
Katon_Goka.description: Great Fire Annihilation technique. Devastating fire release jutsu.

Katon_Goryuka.name: Katon: Gōryūka no Jutsu
Katon_Goryuka.description: Great Dragon Fire technique. Powerful fire dragon jutsu.

Sharingan_Genjutsu.name: Sharingan Genjutsu
Sharingan_Genjutsu.description: Advanced Sharingan genjutsu. Can control and disable opponents.

Phase 1: The Crimson Shadow.description: Solomon begins with Sharingan analysis and basic Katon techniques

Phase 2: The Burning Revenant.description: Solomon activates Mangekyō Sharingan and unleashes Amaterasu

Phase 3: The Exiled Flame.description: Solomon summons his Susanoo and unleashes his full power

Phase 4: The Ultimate Being.description: Solomon becomes the ultimate being, unleashing his final form
